certificates.title: Certificate Applications
certificates.description: Choose the type of certificate you need and complete the online application form. Our streamlined process makes it easy to apply for government certificates.

birth.title: Birth Certificate
birth.description: Apply for a birth certificate for newborns or children
points: Required documents: Hospital certificate, ID proof

death.title: Death Certificate
death.description: Apply for a death certificate for deceased persons
points: Required documents: Medical certificate, ID proof

marriage.title: Marriage Certificate
marriage.description: Apply for a marriage certificate for newlyweds
points: Required documents: Wedding photos, ID proof

noOutstandingDebts.title: Certificate of No Outstanding Debts
noOutstandingDebts.description: Apply for certificate of no outstanding debts

bplCertificate.title: Below Poverty Line (BPL) Certificate
bplCertificate.description: Apply for a Below Poverty Line (BPL) certificate
points: BPL list year and serial number

niradharCertificate.title: Niradhar Certificate
niradharCertificate.description: Apply for a Certificate of Niradhar

fillForm.title: Fill Application Form
fillForm.description: Complete the online form with all required information

uploadDocs.title: Upload Documents
uploadDocs.description: Upload supporting documents using our secure file upload

submitTrack.title: Submit & Track
submitTrack.description: Submit your application and track its progress online

notes: ‚Ä¢ All fields marked with * are mandatory
‚Ä¢ Supported formats: JPG, PNG, PDF, DOC, DOCX
‚Ä¢ Applications are processed within 7-10 working days

common.successMessage: Your application has been submitted and is now under review. You will receive updates about your application status.
common.error: Failed to submit application. Please try again.
common.scanQR: üì± Scan QR code to make payment
common.useUPI: ‚Ä¢ Use any UPI app (PhonePe, GPay, Paytm)

common.supportMessage: For any questions, please contact our support team.

noOutstandingDebts.title: Certificate of No Outstanding Debts
noOutstandingDebts.description: Complete the form below to apply for certificate of no outstanding debts. All fields marked with * are required.
noOutstandingDebts.basicInfoDesc: Enter basic details for the certificate
noOutstandingDebts.certificateNote: This certificate confirms that there are no outstanding debts on the specified property. No additional documents required - only payment receipt.

birth.title: Birth Certificate Application
birth.description: Complete the form below to apply for birth certificate. All fields marked with * are required.
birth.childInfoDesc: Enter details of the child for whom birth certificate is requested
birth.parentsAddressAtBirth: Parents' Address at Time of Child's Birth

death.title: Death Certificate Application
death.description: Complete the form below to apply for death certificate. All fields marked with * are required.

marriage.title: Marriage Certificate Application
marriage.description: Complete the form below to apply for marriage certificate. All fields marked with * are required.

housingAssessment8.title: Housing Assessment (Doc 8) Application
housingAssessment8.description: Complete the form below to apply for the housing assessment register (Document 8). All fields marked with * are required.
housingAssessment8.propertyInfoDesc: Enter the details of the property

bplCertificate.title: Below Poverty Line (BPL) Certificate Application
bplCertificate.description: Complete the form below to apply for the BPL certificate. All fields marked with * are required.
bplCertificate.bplInfoDesc: Enter details from the BPL list

niradharCertificate.title: Niradhar Certificate Application
niradharCertificate.description: Complete the form below to apply for the Niradhar certificate. All fields marked with * are required.
